activities:
Based on client's requirements. Most campaigns differ.

Call Center Services, Inc., through normal outgoing telephonic call center operations, may have and use personal data to contact a business on behalf of our clients. The personal data pertaining to a business contact will have been provided to us by one of our business clients. Businesses hire us to call other businesses; therefore, we may have and use a business customer’s title, the company and address where he/she works, his/her work phone number and his/her business email address.
